work.title: Founder, Editor-in-Chief @ Critical Culture Undergraduate Journal
Undergraduate Researcher @ UC Berkeley School of Information
work.description: Advised by Prof. Tim Tangherlini. Apprehending narrative in the Icelandic saga with literary-theoretical and computational methods.

work.title: Rejected from every REU I applied for
work.description: This was unfortunate, not the least because I thought I was a really good fit for my top choice. This did remind me that REUs are not the be-all, end-all of undergraduate research. I'm now working on something now that I find more compelling (not to mention theoretically and technically involved) than most projects I could access via established programs.

work.title: Director of Technology @ WildHacks
work.description: Leading software development the largest intercollegiate hackathon in the Chicago area.

work.title: Worst grades of my life; almost rescinded from college
work.description: Tell your teachers about your mental ailments and I suspect more of them will like you than did me! I now genuinely believe Northwestern will only rescind your offer if you burn down Ryan Field.

work.title: Student Researcher @ UCSD Programming Systems Group
Built Albio.js, a compiler-powered reactivity library
Research Assistant @ UCSD Lab for Computational Astrophysics
Rejected from the only summer camp I ever applied to
work.description: The only time anyone wants to read your awful bildungsroman autofiction instead of your resume is when you're filling out college applications. Who knew?

play.title: Seeing Lorde for the Ultrasound tour
Saw ARTMS after FKA twigs cancelled the EUSEXUA tour...
